Education.name: Formation Python application development
Education.description: This formation (language python) is a formation for learn to developp web application with Python (Django/Flask). This formation allowed me to consolidate my Python skills (that I got during professional experience). In library Python, I could use Pytest (for unit test), PyGame (Create video game on computer) and psycopg (It's use PostgreSQL with Python).

Education.name: Bachelor of Science and Industrial Technologies
Education.description: The Bachelor of Science and Industrial Technologies in Electrical Engineering, also called ET for Electrical Engineering and formerly F3 is a Bachelor of Technology prepared in high schools and technology. This baccalaureate is intended for students of 1 st and 12th year of high school who specializes in electrical engineering after a second general and technological or a professional diploma: BEP following a first adaptation.

Experience.description_mission: My main mission was the improvement of the application 'CRIT' (Collecte et Remontée d’Informations Terrain) with the framework pylons. CRIT is a digital tool that has a range of features to dynamize and streamline the sharing of information between teams in the field (shop) and those in the client's headquarters. The version of Python used was 2.7

PersonalProject.name: Mac Gyver - Labyrinth
PersonalProject.description: In this 2D labyrinth, MacGyver would have been locked up. The exit is supervised by a bodyguard. To distract him, you need to combine the following: a needle, a small plastic tube and ether, they will allow MacGyver to create a syringe and to lull the guard to escape the labyrinth. For this project, I used the PyGame library.

PersonalProject.name: GrandPy bot
PersonalProject.description: The GrandPy Bot web application give location (via the Google Maps python library) and description (via the Wikipedia python library) of what user form entry.

PersonalProject.name: Pur beurre
PersonalProject.description: Pur beurre is a web app who find a healthier food substitute for the one you've searched for. The criterion of holiness of a food is measured by its nutriscore (letter 'a' means the maximum of holiness, 'e' the weakest).
